TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OleDbError extends System.Object

summary.span: 收集与数据源返回的警告或错误有关的信息。

span.span: Collects information relevant to a warning or error returned by the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发生错误时，将由 OleDb 数据适配器创建此类。This class is created by the OleDb data adapter when an error occurs. 实例是创建和管理通过类，该类反过来创建类。An instance of is created and managed by the class, which in turn is created by the class. 如果错误的严重程度太高，服务器可能会关闭 。If the severity of the error is too great, the server may close the . 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的属性。The following example displays the properties of the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取符合数据库 ANSI SQL 标准的 5 字符错误代码。

span.span: Gets the five-character error code following the ANSI SQL standard for the database.

value.span: 5 个字符的错误代码，它确定错误的来源（如果错误可能来自不止一个地方）。

span.span: The five-character error code, which identifies the source of the error, if the error can be issued from more than one place.

summary.span: 获取错误信息的完整文本。

span.span: Gets the complete text of the error message.
The complete text of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串是在窗体"OleDbError:"后, 跟，和堆栈跟踪。The string is in the form "OleDbError:", followed by the , and the stack trace. 例如:For example: OleDbError:UserId 或密码无效。OleDbError:UserId or Password not valid. \<堆栈跟踪 >\ ## Examples 下面的示例显示各个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbError.ToString Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbError.ToString Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbError.ToString Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbError.ToString Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
